products.name: SC-Remedy
products.description: Our signature immune-boosting blend that combines the power of turmeric, ginger, and fresh citrus. This golden elixir is designed to support your body's natural defenses and provide sustained energy throughout the day.

products.name: J1-Caribbean Crush
products.description: Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with this exotic blend of mango, pineapple, and dragon fruit. A refreshing escape that's packed with vitamins and natural enzymes.

products.name: Mango Paradise Smoothie
products.description: Creamy mango smoothie blended with coconut milk, banana, and a touch of lime. This tropical delight is rich in vitamins and provides a satisfying, nutritious meal replacement.

products.name: Veggie Wrap Supreme
products.description: Fresh vegetables, hummus, and sprouts wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla. A satisfying and nutritious meal that's perfect for lunch or a light dinner.

products.name: Garden Fresh Salad
products.description: Mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and seasonal vegetables with our house-made vinaigrette. A light and refreshing meal packed with nutrients.

products.name: J2-Mint Lemonade
products.description: A refreshing twist on classic lemonade with fresh mint and ginger. The perfect balance of zesty citrus and cooling mint for ultimate refreshment.

products.name: J3-Citrus Berry Revive
products.description: A powerful antioxidant blend combining mixed berries with citrus fruits. Perfect for post-workout recovery and immune system support.

products.name: J4-Minty Pear
products.description: A unique combination of sweet pear, tropical pineapple, and refreshing mint with a hint of ginger for digestive wellness.

products.name: J5-Summer Skin Glow
products.description: A beauty-boosting blend of antioxidant-rich berries and vitamin C-packed kiwi fruit. Perfect for healthy, glowing skin from within.

products.name: J6-Clean & Lean
products.description: A metabolism-supporting blend with strawberries, mint, and hydrating watermelon. Light, refreshing, and perfect for weight management goals.

products.name: J7-Pink Chia Punch
products.description: A superfood powerhouse with omega-3 rich chia seeds, beetroot for stamina, and grapefruit for metabolism. Naturally pink and incredibly nutritious.

products.name: G1-Tropical Green
products.description: The perfect introduction to green juices! Sweet pineapple and apple mask the earthy taste of nutrient-dense greens, making it delicious and healthy.

products.name: G2-Super Greens
products.description: The ultimate green nutrition blend featuring a powerhouse combination of leafy greens. Maximum vitamins, minerals, and chlorophyll in every sip.

products.name: G3-Kale & Hearty
products.description: A creamy, satisfying green juice with nutrient-dense kale, spinach, and creamy avocado. Heart-healthy and incredibly nourishing.

products.name: G4-Pure Veg'd
products.description: A pure vegetable juice blend with no fruit added. Raw, powerful nutrition from kale, parsley, celery, cucumber, and a hint of ginger and lemon.

products.name: D1-Purifier
products.description: A comprehensive detox blend with liver-supporting beetroot, anti-inflammatory turmeric, and nutrient-dense greens. Your daily detox solution.

products.name: D2-Carrot Cayenne Detox
products.description: A metabolism-boosting detox juice with beta-carotene rich carrots, digestive ginger, and metabolism-firing cayenne pepper.

products.name: D3-Pear & Ginger Cleanser
products.description: A gentle cleansing juice with hydrating cucumber, digestive ginger, and naturally sweet pear. Perfect for daily detox maintenance.

products.name: D4-Bitter-Sweet Liver Flush
products.description: A liver-supporting blend with bitter grapefruit, antioxidant-rich green tea, and cleansing parsley. Designed for optimal liver health.

products.name: SC2-Fat Flush
products.description: A metabolism-boosting blend with hydrating coconut water, nutrient-dense spinach, and fat-burning grapefruit. Your weight management ally.

products.name: SC3-Hung Under
products.description: The perfect hangover remedy! Ginger for nausea relief, beetroot for liver support, and greens for essential nutrients to help you bounce back.

products.name: SC4-Youth Juice
products.description: An anti-aging powerhouse with antioxidant-rich blueberries, hydrating cucumber, and tropical pineapple. Your fountain of youth in a glass.

products.name: SC5-Green Supreme
products.description: The ultimate green nutrition shot with maximum chlorophyll, vitamins, and minerals. Pure green power for optimal health and energy.

products.name: SC6-Brain Booster
products.description: Enhance mental clarity with mixed berries for brain health, beetroot for blood flow, and watermelon for hydration. Your cognitive enhancement blend.

products.name: SC7-Digestive Detox
products.description: A digestive wellness blend with soothing mint, warming ginger, and enzyme-rich kiwifruit. Perfect for digestive health and comfort.

products.name: SC8-Pure Apple
products.description: Simple, pure, and refreshing. Cold-pressed apple juice with no additives - just the natural sweetness and nutrition of premium organic apples.

products.description: A classic indulgent milkshake with rich chocolate, creamy banana, fresh milk, and natural honey. Pure comfort in a glass.
